divs: Sighting DetailsNo much to tell,my wife looked through the kitchen window and noticed something.It was overcasted sky but the moon shined trough,it was cold,i grabbed the camera and i took a few pictures and run inside(too cold)When i downloaded the pictures i realized that it was an ufo.It was after supper,it was really visible,I new it was an ufo,cigar shape cruising slowly.I was really exited.Kept on going and was dark,out of site in a few minutes.Please when check the pictures zoom out and you'll see it clearly.
